website_summaries.verdict: A great general battery load tester that comes with advanced features and a simple interface.
pros: Extremely accurate test results for most automotive batteries
Capable of testing different types of batteries
Controls are simple to use straight out of the box
cons: LCD screen and menu can be difficult to navigate without reviewing the instructions

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this foxwell battery tester to analyze auto batteries. I have 5 old vehicles in my household, and I don't have to take vehicles to a garage anymore, whenever I have battery problems. This tester is very simple and easy to use. It shows my battery level and determines the battery conditions. It also shows if the alternator is charging the battery. With this tester, now I can analyze myself that if it is problem with batterey, or alternator, instead of taking vehicle to a garage. I'm saving time and money. This tester is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny lee

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Works well, good rubber cladding(beefier than expected) comes with good case, instructions I should read someday, the instrument prompts you through the whole process, I haven’t tried the blue tooth printing feature but probably will soon. MUCH faster than testing a battery with a DMM & O scope
customer_reviews.author: J. Doe

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I bought it to check golf cart batteries not really designed for 8 volt batteries. I was able to verify if battery was dead just not a true load test. I tested a 12 volt marine battery worked great identified the one that was bad. Also just for fun usded it’s Bluetooth function and connected to printer worked and printed off report showing dead cells
customer_reviews.author: Mac Hohenberger

customer_reviews.title: Wife approved.
customer_reviews.text: The Foxwell battery test is worth every penny spent. Having the ability to check the battery health makes this a wonderful tool to have at your disposal. A quick and easy way to identify the health of your battery. Just enter the original CCA (cold cranking amps) and follow the instructions on the screen - yes, it is just that simple. If you reside in one of the hot states this meter will help you determine when your battery is on its last cell (leg).
customer_reviews.author: Jason Parrish

customer_reviews.title: An excellent time saving machine
customer_reviews.text: Its simple to use the only thing in the test the meter gave a percentage rating for soh and soc . nothing is mentioned in the manual for these test . SOC stands for state of charge SOH stands for state of health . I checked several vehicles with known problems and it detected them Also checked 2 new vehicles with expected results. I use this equipment in a rental co. I have to check anything from forklifts mowers even big diesel trucks and it was money well spent because it will save me many hours of diagnostic time.
customer_reviews.author: Wendell Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Just clip it to the battery, answer the simple prompts, and you have a read out of remaining capacity of your battery and either battery good or replace battery. Also has an excellent starter testing mode. Finally, if you happen to have a Bluetooth enabled printer, this will pair with it so you can print the results. Very high build quality. Auto backlit screen. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Loving life!

customer_reviews.title: ... it to confirm an auto shop's diagnosis of a bad battery. The battery still works fine but is ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it to confirm an auto shop's diagnosis of a bad battery. The battery still works fine but is about 30-40% down on CCA. On first test it informed me that the surface charge had to be depleted. I got into a bit of a situation once or twice where, during RPM detection I couldn't seem to back out of the menus to restart the test - I had to power down the unit by disconnecting from the battery and starting again. The included case is nice but the unit is built solidly enough I have no hesitation simply keeping it in my toolbag along with other tools.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, works exactly as described. Highly recommended. I had consequently purchased 2 Optima batteries around the same time. I used the tester on them and found 1 to be bad. Nice to know before you install in your vehicle. This will also test your charging system.
customer_reviews.author: Gutter Guy

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't Trust the Results
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this tester but I just couldn't trust the results. It consistently gave incorrect messages such as battery needs recharging on fairly new batteries that were working fine on cars with good charging systems. It would ask to rev the engine during the charging system test, but most of the time said engine rev not detected, even trying a wide of variety of revving scenarios. Contacted the seller and they told me to return it. Will try something else.
customer_reviews.author: JV

customer_reviews.title: It works...
customer_reviews.text: I have large 8D AGM batteries on my RV. Before just going ahead and spending thousands on new batteries I wanted to test them for capacity. The test results were consistent, showing that they had between 30-40% of CCA capacity. That's not necessarily a measure of capacity at a low current draw, but it does reflect the effective available surface capacity of the plates, so close enough for me to go ahead replacing them knowing that I'm not throwing money away. It's one of those wonderful products that make the job easy.
customer_reviews.author: M. Tinker

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Needed to update my battery testing tools and decided to go with a Foxwell battery tester based on reviews. I like the ease of use and the tester did diagnose a bad battery that I was having problems with. One thing that irritates me is the lack of printer choices, seems that you need to buy a foxwell printer and the printer is not available on Amazon. If I had to buy another battery tester I would buy the Foxwell battery tester with the integrated printer.
customer_reviews.author: Glen E ThomasTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: So far really like this tester
customer_reviews.text: So far really like this tester. I just received it and only used it once. Tested battery CCA and Charging circuit. The charging circuit test has you idel/rev with no load and same test with load (lights, fan, radio etc.) while in park. Pretty cool. Will update if i find any problems with it but by the feel and look of it this will be a long lasting tester.
customer_reviews.author: ConsumerJoe

customer_reviews.title: Same issues as other reviews
customer_reviews.text: Had problems from the start with weird readings. Sometimes I would get a reading of the CCA as being almost 3 times the numbers I was entering and what was on the battery label. I also had a problem while bench testing a battery that the unit gave me a reading of "vehicle already running." It was the first day of use so I just boxed it back up to go to Amazon returns as opposed to contacting the manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Greay value
customer_reviews.text: I work at a Lexus dealership. We have a shop supplied MidTronics battery tester that costs over $1,000. I am incredibly impressed by the features offered on this model for around $100 in comparison. It does all of the same things such as battery tests (via CCA, JIS, ETC), a starter test, and alternator output. Very impressive. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Showstopper

customer_reviews.title: Great item.
customer_reviews.text: Great item.. I tested 4 batteries;bad and good ones. They all had consistent results on mutiple tests. Im convince this tool will help me daignose future batteries. I did notice that for accuracy you must connect the alligator clips directly on the battery posts with clear connection. If you don't, the results will be in inccurate. So make sure your battery post are free of corrosion.
customer_reviews.author: Raul M Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: great so far!
customer_reviews.text: super simple to use: 0. no on/off button, attach to battery, and it automajically turns on... 1. charge/dead... was smart enough to detect if good, or good-but-needs-recharge 2. tests cranking 3. tests alternator that said, my battery is still dying... so now i have to do a parasitic drain test (with a multimeter), but it eliminates the variable of needing a new battery. will try on a known dead battery and report back...
customer_reviews.author: L. Caballes

customer_reviews.title: Update: Only worked for a month and 5 days...
customer_reviews.text: Great tool. Very easy to use and accurate results. UPDATE: Worked for a month and 5 days...No longer eligible for return.
customer_reviews.author: Getafix

customer_reviews.title: Not at all accurate
customer_reviews.text: one star is too good for this unit. I read the manual. I tested a known power source with its own display that was verified with two high quality multimeters. One was a Fluke 77 series hand held multimeter and the other a Tektronics cdm250 bench multimeter. These two sources were within .1VDC a tenth of a volt of one another and the source display. The FOXWELL BT705 Automotive 100-2000 CCA Battery Load Tester was 6.1VDC too high. That is six volts DC! Needless to say, this is unacceptable when testing 12VDC. LOL! This unit is more electronic CRAP from China! Run away from these units!
customer_reviews.author: Albert M.

customer_reviews.title: No Warranty support till repeated requests for help, now resolved
customer_reviews.text: Had it 9 months, Tested a couple dozen batteries then quit working. Goes thru all the steps then just shows Hook to a 12v battery, Have tested on several batteries, No good. Trying to get it Warranty to fix it for over a month now, No one will reply or help. Now getting close to warranty running out, No support from Foxwell or amazon so far, 3/03/19 Finally got to them, they replaced my defective tester.
customer_reviews.author: Rgrpm

customer_reviews.title: Takes The Mystery Out of Battery Condition
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for testing 12 Volt batteries. I use this tester on wet cell vehicle batteries and 12 volt UPS lead gel cells. The menu is intuitive and easy to follow insuring that the correct test conditions are set for the type of battery under examination. I do wish for more voltage ranges such as 6 and 24 volt, though this is a minor complaint in an otherwise excellent product for the cost. The test leads and clip are sturdy an will stand up to many years of use. The molded case is a nice bonus, though I never store the tester in the case.
customer_reviews.author: J. Yamashita

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use !
customer_reviews.text: This battery tester rivals dealership quality testers I’ve worked at both a ford and gm dealer and this tester is just as good as theirs if your looking for a detailed easy to use tester look no further !
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect readings
customer_reviews.text: I got 4 brand new batteries (Exide Brand) , tested them 3 are dead. Tested with carbon pile tester batteries are ok.
customer_reviews.author: Vlad T

customer_reviews.title: There is no support for this
customer_reviews.text: This product worked fine until it didn't. And it didn't in a spectacular way. After spending $134 for it and getting no reply from the support email, I've decided to never use a Foxwell item again. It's too expensive to have to replace for no apparent reason at all.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B. Fine

customer_reviews.title: This is a reliable tester I can help you avoid being stranded in the winter
customer_reviews.text: Folks I've been using this tester for almost 2 years and it has never failed me. On batteries that were having problems it definitely diagnosed them as bad. I've never had a battery fail that it diagnosed as good. Not one friend or family member that I have used this tool to test their batteries has been led astray in two years and we're talking dozens of uses. Sure I may not be a commercial shop but I definitely value this tool and have used it a lot. I have owned cheap ones in the past that let me down but not this unit.
customer_reviews.author: George Spafford

customer_reviews.title: Very handy tool to have in your toolbox
customer_reviews.text: This tester works very well, especially for the price. Only reason for the four stars is that I was under the impression it had a built in battery so that it could at least provide a reading on even the most dead batteries (0v). If you don't have at least a few volts, this tester will not power on. If you do have a few volts it works great and is very handy when trying to determine if a discharged battery is just "dead" or "DEAD" (i.e. bad). Takes a lot of the guessing game out of it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Morris

customer_reviews.title: A surprisingly great little tester
customer_reviews.text: I was really skeptical about these testers with no heat sinks that don't really put any significant load on the battery. Actually bought another cheaper conventional one along with it, but with 5 batteries that I have (ranging from about 20 to 100 AH) it's been spot on. I wish there was an AH mode, but even with CCA or any other test it will pretty much tell you what the state of your battery is. Really thought I would be returning it after trying it, but I would absolutely recommend it. Though in general I do also recommend having some other way of testing. Having two (one doesn't have to be expensive) confirms the other.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitry

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat this tester!
customer_reviews.text: I've only used my Foxwell BT705 a couple of times, but it does everything you could ask of a battery tester, quickly and easily. The menus are simple to scroll through. Results are fast and accurate. Checking the health of the battery, the cranking power, and the charging system (alternator) are a piece of cake for this tester. I love the long leads it comes with. The plastic case is strong and sturdy. It's a bit pricey, but you definitely get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: MrG

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in this boat anchor.
customer_reviews.text: The BT705 works very well on battery. The batteries are about 3-4 years old with Texas heat and the Cummins heat when running it’s hard on batteries. The case could be designed better for storage of clamps. The cables could be longer to allow for starting and reading a right hand battery. Disappointed that this will not work on a dual battery diesel and there was no notation from the seller or maker in their ads.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia G

customer_reviews.title: Unsure of results
customer_reviews.text: You can test the same battery five times and get six different results. Not sure if all of them are like this but I purchased it with the hopes of saving money on batteries but I’m now afraid that I’ve thrown away good batteries because if this tester .
customer_reviews.author: RadTech

customer_reviews.title: Auto shop owner approved!
customer_reviews.text: I own an auto shop and I can certainly say this is a great tool. Love the simple readout of “replace battery” “charge battery” also the cranking test, and alternator output test. is extremely helpful. Takes a few seconds to test vs my $1200 diagnostic tablet which takes several minutes. I got a coupon with mine so I got it for $108 which is a price you can’t beat for something like this. Performs like a $300+ quality battery tester
customer_reviews.author: John Bowling

customer_reviews.title: Stop guessing and get the best results with this solid tester
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend this tester. Stop guessing what it can be and buy yourself some relief with this battery/alternator/starter tester and you'll be happy you did. I use it at least twice a month at the shop and its paid for itself within the first 2 months. Its reliable and accurate. I've compared it with another brand and the readings are the same or +/- 2. Make sure your connections are straight to the battery posts and secured to get the best possible results.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: As a automotive technician by trade I ordered this tester as a replacement for my aging Snap On unit which was on its last legs. I have to say that the tester performs above expectations. It does everything the more expensive testers do at a fraction of the cost. Would recommend it without hesitation.
customer_reviews.author: joseph allen

customer_reviews.title: Has nice long test leads and heavy duty ends which make hookup and testing very nice !!!
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is much better in my opinion than the others out there ! Have used most of the other testers and i am happy to say this is far better than most others unless your spending mega dollars on industrial equipment. VERY pleased!!! I have worked on cars,trucks for over 40 years Hope this helps
customer_reviews.author: Denise D.

customer_reviews.title: Foxy Lady
customer_reviews.text: I have a motorhome that for some reason keeps dying after a few days. I purchased this tool in a few minutes was able to find the bad battery considering I have 8 batteries total. This tool like others have said really walks you through each step without having to read the manual. Love it so far, It seems to be of good quality and we will see after I run it through its paces.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 90 days
customer_reviews.text: When it worked it was fine stopped working after 90 days.
customer_reviews.author: Stschott

customer_reviews.title: Great product one battery saved pays for unit !
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use, just plug and go. Had a battery that was sitting on the floor for a year and was able to test for capacity in two minutes. Saving yourself one unnecessary battery replacement and that will pay for unit. Used as part of a preventative program you'll only need to replace your battery when it's absolutely necessary. Unit checks charging system as well which gives you additional piece of mind. Quality construction, flexible leads, nice clips and a carrying case to protect your investment. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: KBrady

customer_reviews.title: Good quality I recommend it
customer_reviews.text: I took my car to auto zone to get charging system check. I had to wait long time because it was busy and I neede to go soon, so finally the guy check my car and appreciate that. When I saw his tester I said to myself I need to have one of those and did.
customer_reviews.author: Tone Bone Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to any series at home mechanic or any shop.
customer_reviews.text: The battery analyzing feature is great. I really liked the over all system analyzer as well. Being able to see what kind of draw your starter is pulling is a must have. Seeing crank time is icing on the cake. Seeing max load and load at idle on your alternator takes out a lot of guess work. It is easy to use. In fact you will probably test several batteries and do a full analysis on your charging system just for the fun of it.
customer_reviews.author: Schrep

customer_reviews.title: Great value, displays CCA results.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used MidTronic products for years but they are pricey. I tried this unit based on reviews and I am impressed. Greater range than others. Comes with protective case. Some tests require a lot of button pushes to get through the prompts, but I mostly use “battery in vehicle” and press right through. Results are easy to read. Displays actual CCA test results as well as pass/fail/charge.
customer_reviews.author: MikeByTheSea

customer_reviews.title: Quick results on battery condition
customer_reviews.text: This Load tester is really nice, easy to use and provides test results that can be printed out. The connection cables are long so you can sit in the vehicle and run prompted tests. Best thing is that it comes with a durable hard storage case. Tests can be be done with the battery in or out of the vehicle. I have an older manual 50 amp load tester that has given me years of good confident service, but this one far surpasses its capability.
customer_reviews.author: C. Roiz Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I did not want to spend the money but I have buying junk. I bit the bullet and I love this thing. I cleaned up my shop for all the batteries I thought were still good. I can tell if a battery is getting old or just needs a recharge. I dont use it everyday but I its a great tool to have in my box when I need it. If you can afford it this is the one to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor J. Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Nice tool and very accurate
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be very accurate as I hooked it up to a known bad battery and it gave me the same results as the ones professional shops use I also tried it on a couple other good batteries one new and one 4 years old and it was very consistent with the professional units. So far it seems to be a very well built and useful tool almost anyone could use
customer_reviews.author: Ohiocowboy1277

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. It is amazing how many things it tests and how it gives a complete analysis of my batteries. I have a lot of toys and a lot of batteries so I try to keep all the batteries in good condition but all I’ve had was just a analog load tester. Apparently that thing wasn’t telling me much bc I found that I have some bad batteries and didn’t know it. I would recommend this product to anyone. It test the battery, tells u the charge level, the battery life left, the cca, tests a vehicles starter system and charging system. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: lance p.

customer_reviews.title: Does not test 24 Volt
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these, out of the 4, 1 project inaccurate results, they cannot test 24v systems even though it says it does. I contacted customers service via phone and email in China and they were supposed to email me back nothing and its been 4 months now. Product its easy to use and I would have given a better review if indeed it would actually do what it says it does 24V!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Mila

customer_reviews.title: Great battery tester
customer_reviews.text: Been looking for battery tester. Read the great reviews. There right. Perfect. Very easy to use. Very nice size thick cables with very nice length. Easily reached inside my vehicles. Large easy to read screen. Easy to follow directions on screen. This is a great tool added to my toolbox
customer_reviews.author: Mike K

customer_reviews.title: Solid, sturdy, relatively easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works with battery installed or outside of a vehicle. Accommodates multiple battery types (AGM, wet cell, marine, etc). Compares performance to specification for installed batteries which is a plus. Heavy-duty case with rubber shock protection, quality leads and clamps. You will need to know the specifications of your battery which can be an inconvenience with batteries that lack such data in an easily accessible location. Tells you unequivocally when you need a new battery (unlike my old resistance-type battery tester). I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Silverseal99

customer_reviews.title: Battery testing made easy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Foxwell BT705 battery tester for my own personal use. I hooked it up to my vehicle when I got it to try it out and it did everything it was supposed to do. Easy to use and has a hard shell case to protect it. It came well protected in the box when it came. It came a little less than a week from the time I ordered it. I would highly recommend this tester to anyone who wants to know the condition of their battery and if the charging system in their car or truck is working properly. This product is a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mr Cruze

customer_reviews.title: This is great
customer_reviews.text: I read the owners manual but you can throw it away afterwards because every time you hook it up to a battery it asks you all the questions it needs to know plus some instructions like rev the engine. Very accurate. buy it!
customer_reviews.author: rodney larson

customer_reviews.title: Great battery analyzer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great battery analyzer. I used it often. Mine quite working after testing a 24V system. The description is a little hard to understand concerning 12v and 24v. I tested a 24v system and I must have done something wrong because it will read a 12v system anymore. I am past the warranty period but it was worth it and I would purchase again but I was informed by Foxwell that the tool is no longer made. If Amazon has this in stock and you need one, get one.
customer_reviews.author: Nvable

customer_reviews.title: Tester worked well and pointed to the faulty part.
customer_reviews.text: Overall very satisfied. My battery warning light was coming on. The tester said the battery was good but the alternator output was bad. Removed the alternator and had it tested at the auto parts store and it also failed there. Installed a new alternator and retested with this tester and everything tested good. Only reason I rated it a 4 star was because I felt the instructions were lacking explanation and direction. For example, no definition of the 3 types of batteries to pick from.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: A Must for every Home Mechanic
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used my device yet because I bought it after the immediate need. It will be available the next time I need it. The best bang for the buck from what I've read.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Sewell

customer_reviews.title: best money i ever spent
customer_reviews.text: no time wasted, write on the money for troubleshooting, I gave one these bt 705 to my kid, the problem hes having with battery tester now, all the wantabe mechanics want to borrow it, never ever let the boy next door, use you electronics...
customer_reviews.author: Mike Russell

customer_reviews.title: Not as described.
customer_reviews.text: Product was not as described. Description clearly states 10 different battery standards are supported. The kind only eight are supported unfortunately the one that I needed is one of the ones that was clearly described but in fact is not supported. Multiple attempts to take care of the issue and two weeks later no attempt on seller's behalf to provide support. Seems like a nice unit but not as described and not supported by the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good tester wish you could select the test you wanna run
customer_reviews.text: Nice easy to use, easy to read. It has to run a complete diagnostic test on your system you cannot select what function you want to perform. Kinda inconvenient when I wanna just test the battery or just the alternator output.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Jurrians

customer_reviews.title: Great product for individiual with limited experience in battery operation
customer_reviews.text: This was a good tool to have. Used to find out that one auto battery 30 months old was going bad. Got it replaced before warranty was going to expire. Only issue that I had to read the instructions a couple of times and look at a video to get a clear understanding of the functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Hawaii Guy

customer_reviews.title: It's cheap
customer_reviews.text: For the price, sure, it's a great product. What is the saying though, you get what you pay for. Upon opening the package I notice that the clips don't look like they wont open real wide, nope. I choose to try it out on my motorcycle since it's in the garage. Hook it up and the unit says 36v?? What?? Disconnect/reconnect still says 36v. Disconnect/reconnect this time says 12v. The unit has not malfunctioned since then, so I just chalk it up as a glitch. I would definitely suggest buying one because it's a great tool for what it is
customer_reviews.author: James Lee

customer_reviews.title: This is a reliable battery tester
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived in a timely fashion. Ever since I've used this battery tester in our shop it has worked flawlessly. I am very happy with my purchase. Even though i haven't found any bad batteries yet, i feel more confident with this battery tester than the more expensive one that's in our shop because i would always get inconsistent results with the shop tester that was priced around $1000.00 dollars. Would recommend to any professional technician looking for an accurate battery tester.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: Was "A little hard to read." Until OBDZON replaced the tester.
customer_reviews.text: On the original unit I received, the display backlight flickered on and off randomly. However, the seller was extra responsive and actively worked with me to replace the tester with a working unit at no additional cost to me. I have tested the replacement battery tester and it works well. Thank you OBDZON for your efforts in resolving the issues and resolving them quickly.....
customer_reviews.author: Gary Hutchison

customer_reviews.title: A very good tool
customer_reviews.text: I received this item and 2 days later had to put it to the test and it preformed very well. Was able to isolate the problem and get it resolved with out any problem, thanks for a great tool.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use for beginners like myself. My rig has 8 batteries and I was having trouble recently with some of them but wasn’t sure which. After disconnecting all my batteries I was able to quickly identify the bad batteries. Replaced them myself saving a lot of money from having to do it over the road.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Lee Williams Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Low Charge
customer_reviews.text: I want to evaluate my P/U truck battery from time to time because it sits for months at a time in between recreation trips. This takes the guess out of having a serviceable / rechargeable battery.
customer_reviews.author: Jim O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and attractive design
customer_reviews.text: This unit came in about 4 days ahead of schedule and was very well packaged to protect it in shipping. I have tested three batteries and am very well pleased with the results.It correctly identified a bad battery which I suspected was failing.This tester is very well designed and attractive.The display is very easy to read and navigate. It also came with a hard plastic case to store it in, which was a bonus because I was not expecting that. Overall a very high quality instrument and am extremely pleased with my purchase. I would order again if the need arose.
customer_reviews.author: Skyhawk

customer_reviews.title: I can vouch for this one...
customer_reviews.text: This tester works as advertised. I tested several batteries and also the charging systems on our vehicles. This tester helped me identify a bad battery that was still under warranty and when I returned it they put their own tester on it and backed up my results. There are less expensive battery/charging system testers available but I can tell you from experience this one works.
customer_reviews.author: Buffalo's Outdoors

customer_reviews.title: Screen issues
customer_reviews.text: Got to check about 8-9 batteries with it. Worked well. Easy to use. Readings were fairly consistent with other devices. But now when I connect, it shows the model number clearly when it boots. Then it loses contrast and can't be read. I don't understand. It's always been kept in the case and in a cool environment. Now I feel it was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Mike B

customer_reviews.title: it reads incorrect voltage everytime I connect it and according ...
customer_reviews.text: it reads incorrect voltage everytime I connect it and according to the alternator test feature every car I test has excessive diode ripple!
customer_reviews.author: eric yunker

customer_reviews.title: Easy,fast & accurate piece of testing equipment.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this battery tester because I was having suspected battery issues in my 2001 Dodge Ram 2500 Diesel. Not wanting to spend the money on 2 batteries if it wasn’t the issue I decided to test both batteries and found that both batteries did in fact need to be replaced! The meter showed me I was only getting 45 CCA out of a 810 CCA battery! Replaced both batteries & haven’t had an issue since. Very easy to use & fast getting the results. Would be a compliment to anyone’s toolbox.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great battery tester
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality tool that is easy to use, has long leads so you can sit in your car and run the battery test without any assistance. Comes with nice storage case and easy to follow instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Wk

customer_reviews.title: Great Tester
customer_reviews.text: This is the first and hopefully last battery tester I have purchased. So far I've use it on my zero turn mower, dodge truck, lincoln mkx, and my friends acura. It did confirm an alternator problem in my wifes car which we suspected and was also confirmed by a shop. I just wanted it verified before I put faith into something I never used before. Easy to use striaght out of the box and easy to read.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well! I am not a mechanic I just enjoy tinkering on cars. I have been having problems with my battery in my truck for a few years. This helped me find the problem and fix it!
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: Extremely user friendly
customer_reviews.text: Device has rugged construction and thick cables. Extremely user friendly directions on screen. Test battery voltage, CCA's, starter motor voltage, and alternator output. Gives everything you need to be proactive on a weak battery or charging system. I found to be very accurate, tested the systems on my five cars twice, and results were consistent. Test battery in my auto shop that I knew were defective and this tester confirmed it. I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pat W.

customer_reviews.title: This thing saved me money
customer_reviews.text: This device saved my on a new AMG battery I was told at a parts store it was bad. This tester showed different and it turned out to be something else.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory C.

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Accuracy is at best bad. Checked the same battery several time and I got different results every time. This was used on a glass mat battery just two days old. I would not buy this by any means.
customer_reviews.author: CONNIE R. LEAF-ADAMS

customer_reviews.title: Easy use
customer_reviews.text: I just got to use the FOXWELL Battery Tester and I am very pleased with how easy it is to use and understand just follow the instructions and you will find out your problem.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Calkins

customer_reviews.title: Important tool to have.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Already helped me get a replacement battery just before the warranty ran out. Easy to use. Decent case. Walks you through all the tests. Nothing to not like.
customer_reviews.author: TechFan1972

customer_reviews.title: Terrible, too many bells and whistles. Keeps giving error messages
customer_reviews.text: Useless. I use this on a yacht to test tender batteries, main engine, generator and service batteries. Constantly reading surface charge, engine running etc. Would return it if it wasn't out of the return window
customer_reviews.author: Craig Price

customer_reviews.title: A needed tool in your diagnostic tool box .
customer_reviews.text: Great battery tester. Easy to use, intuitive and provides clear on screen prompts for chronological steps. Seems to be accurate and helpful to detect weak batteries and charging system. Has a starter test that tells you good or bad but I was disappointed that it did not tell me the actual starting current. Seems that is a common miss on these type of testers. I would still buy this again and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey F.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This tester is so easy to use, it walks you through step by step for each function. You almost can't do something wrong, I love it. The manual is very easy to understand, very well written.
customer_reviews.author: debbie vette

customer_reviews.title: Good Price, could be better
customer_reviews.text: Good price and mostly works well. It under reports the CCA results by about 5% so it will under report the State of Heath by a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Mike In NJ

customer_reviews.title: Great but printing option hasn't worked for me
customer_reviews.text: Great to check charging system but printing option hasn't worked for me at all need printing option for customer copy don't buy(note I'm a mechanic ) that's only draw back
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: as advertised
customer_reviews.text: really love this unit. so simple to use. i needed to add to my tool kit as ive become quite the home mechanic. will look into other products offered by this brand
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Vela

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Its a great battery tester. Tests the entire vehicle with both loads on and off as well as the vehicles starting system. total overkill for the DIY but great for someone who works on cars part time
customer_reviews.author: sweatyyetti

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Checks battery condition, starting system, and charging system easily and quickly. Found battery that didn't think had a problem was down on CCA and needed to be charged. Battery is old, but all other systems are good. Battery recharged, and doubled CCA. Hope lengthened time before need to replace, can check to see if recharge and cleaning of cables did any good.
customer_reviews.author: Dwight Clews

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: In the past I have ran my batteries to the point that they have taken out my alternator. This will tell you exactly when your battery is getting weak and needs to be replaced. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Craig C Rowling

customer_reviews.title: Battery Tester
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for Christmas gift, so I can't really provide performance issues. It was delivered quickly and I'm sure it will be greatly appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: CaroleA

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Solid construction, good feel. Works great. Alligator clips are nice and aggressive. I don't like the case, kind of tedeous to put away. Almost all vehicles I test say excessive ripple.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Very handy for 12v batteries
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised! I do most of my own work on all of our motorized vehicles/items requiring a battery to start its engine. Very handy item let's me know battery condition and life left till needs replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Shwanky1

customer_reviews.title: Easy and straight forward
customer_reviews.text: The unit is simple and clean and easy to us. The 15 year learned how to use it with on his project car in about 10 mintues... with out the manual. Handy unit. Have fun.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Use it every single day in the field and for the price, you can’t beat it. This is a must have if you are a technician or a do it diy type of guy.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I feel like I have a fleet of vehicles to maintain with family and friends cars. This tester is more convenient than having to run to autozone.
customer_reviews.author: fguerero66

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good tool that give you plenty of information
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good tool that give you plenty of information. The Cen-Tec device from Harbor Freight also works just about as well. This is a little easier to use though.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S

customer_reviews.title: For the independent woman!
customer_reviews.text: I own 3 older vehicles. When they break down, I don't have to take them to mechanic & pay for diagnostic test. This test battery, sensors, alternator, starter... I can find out what the problem is myself and save that money!!! My nephew, ex husband & brothers want to borrow it to check their cars. Worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Gave me a condition on my battery
customer_reviews.text: Using it together with a charger that reconditions the battery. Gives you a good before and after condition reading.
customer_reviews.author: Pernilla Miami Beach

customer_reviews.title: Very nice battery tester works like a champ
customer_reviews.text: Really very impressed with this battery tester used it quite a few times . well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: I bought this to test marine batteries on boats, it has been easy to use and works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The tester arrived with a loose piece of plastic rattling around inside the case. It was easy to open it up and remove the loose plastic chip, but that never should have made it past any QC inspection. It was like a rattle when you picked it up. It had a QC sticker on it, but obviously the unit was not checked out
customer_reviews.author: brian a mossman

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for testing your vehicles battery and charging system
customer_reviews.text: Recommend for testing your vehicles battery and charging system. Easy to use and very accurate. Already made my diagnosing of daughters car issues easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth H

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Clear display. Easy to read and use. I wished it would have been able to test deep cycle batteries, but can not.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. S.

customer_reviews.title: Great battery tester
customer_reviews.text: I have used many battery testers over the years and this tester is awesome for the price. Is seems very accurate and does the same as many more expensive units I have used
customer_reviews.author: John Van Artsen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tool for the Job
customer_reviews.text: Use it to check my customers' generator batteries so the battery doesn't go dead in the Winter when they may need it most.
customer_reviews.author: B. McCament

customer_reviews.title: Does a great job
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and accurate. Alternator output test and starter test a great feature
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and effective
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Long leads allow putting it thru door window to start engine and rev it. Well made product. Easy to follow menu. Screen clear with easy read characters.
customer_reviews.author: Do-It-Yourself

product_meta.title: Battery Tester FOXWELL BT705 Automotive 100-2000 CCA Battery Load Tester, 12V 24V Car Cranking and Charging System Test Scan Tool Digital Battery Analyzer for Cars and Heavy Duty Trucks
feature_bullets: 【BATTERY ANALYZER】 BT705 automobile battery tester designed for 12 V or 24 V batteries with a capacity of 100 to 2000 CCA, such as regular flooded, AGM flat plate, AGM spiral, GEL and deep cycle batteries, 12V & 24V starting and charging system. The test results based on CCA, EN, CA, MCA, DIN, SAE, JIS and IEC Standards.

【CAR BATTERIES DOCTOR】 Adopt the advanced conductance testing technology, the premium quality copper clip and wire maintain a stable communication all throughout the testing process to provide you with reliable results! Accurately and quickly measure the actual cold cranking amps, capability of the vehicle starting battery and healthy state of the battery itself.

【CRANKING AND CHARGING SYSTEM TEST】 BT705 auto tester displays the decision on the starter system, cranking voltage, and cranking time in milliseconds. Also, the battery diagnostic tool can check 12V or 24V charging system to make sure the output voltage of the generator is in a regular condition, the rectifier diode works fine and the charging current is a normal status.

【WORTH TO OWN】 BT705 car battery analyzer can accurate reading of battery health status in just 2. 5 seconds in its large and easy to use backlit LCD display, help you diagnose and resolve car health problems timely without disconnecting the battery or using a separate battery.

【100% SATISFACTORY SERVICE】 Please make sure that both contacts of the positive and negative clips are in good contact to get accurate values. More detail, please refer to the "Installation Manual" on the Product Information''. The 7. 8ft cable allowed you to do the test from inside of the vehicle, whether you own your personal mechanic shop or private owner, you’ll fall in love with this battery analyzer!

specifications.Cover Included: 1 *Hard Carrying Case, 1 * FOXWELL BT705 12V 24V Automobile Battery Tester, 1 * User's Manual
specifications.Special Features: 🍀 AGM flat plat, 🍀 Fonction of bluetooth printing, 🍀 Quickly and accurately display test result in just 3 seconds, 🍀 AGM spiral and gel batteries, 🍀 Test 12V regular flooded, 🍀 Test car 12V&24V charging system
specifications.Vehicle Service Type:
FOXWELL bt705 battery tester can test all 12v batteries of 100-2000 CCA regular flooded, AGM flat plate, AGM spiral and GEL batteries.

It performs actual Cold Cranking Amps test, the health status test, and detect common faults of both starting and generator charging systems. Test result display in just about 2.5 seconds, 2x faster than most cheaper testers.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars586 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
